mapper.insert: insert into base_user (ID, USER_TYPE, LOGIN_NAME, REAL_NAME, NICK_NAME, PASSWORD, IMAGE_ID, SUPERMAN, PHONE_NUMBER, SIGNATURE, EMAIL, CREAT_USER, CREAT_DATE, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_DATE,SEX,STATUS ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{superman,jdbcType=BIT}, #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sex,jdbcType=BIT},#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update base_user set USER_TYPE = #{userType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, LOGIN_NAME = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REAL_NAME = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NICK_NAME = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IMAGE_ID = #{imageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUPERMAN = #{superman,jdbcType=BIT}, PHONE_NUMBER = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SIGNATURE = #{signature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREAT_USER = #{creatUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREAT_DATE = #{creatDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, USER_TYPE, LOGIN_NAME, REAL_NAME, NICK_NAME, PASSWORD, IMAGE_ID, SUPERMAN, PHONE_NUMBER, SIGNATURE, EMAIL, CREAT_USER, CREAT_DATE, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_DATE from base_user where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, USER_TYPE, LOGIN_NAME, REAL_NAME, NICK_NAME, PASSWORD, IMAGE_ID, SUPERMAN, PHONE_NUMBER, SIGNATURE, EMAIL, CREAT_USER, CREAT_DATE, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_DATE from base_user
